title: The Rebel
description: Wounded, Guardian is thrown from one battle to the next. As she struggles to survive, a new fire ignites inside her. Guardian has found acceptance from the Rebels, but can she keep what she has done hidden from the Normals she serves? Jonas's quest for freedom will bring him face to face with Guardian. She is the one Freak he promised himself he would never hurt. But, can he keep that promise? Find out in the Freaks Episode 3.
author: J.O. Young
